attributes.action: not monitor conversations on social networks, online messengers or phone calls.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The home office plans to monitor conversations in social networks, online messengers and phone calls to prevent terrorist activity. This is a gross breach of privacy and no terrorist would use these methods (excluding phone calls) to plan attacks.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
